title: To amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to assure the financial solvency of Medicare+Choice organizations and Medicaid managed care organizations.
content: HMO Solvency Act of 2001 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to establish solvency-related requirements for Medicaid managed care organizations, requirements that include periodic financial reporting to the State, independent audits, and approval of certain subcontractors. Amends part C (MedicareChoice) of SSA title XVIII (Medicare) to establish solvency-related requirements for application to MedicareChoice organizations. Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide for the application of such requirements to organizations other than MedicareChoice organizations that receive payment on a capitated basis for provision of Medicare services.
